title: Iggy Azalea DELETES of her Instagram photos amid Cardi B rift rumours
text:
She's the Australian rapper who has been involved in a string of famous feuds over the years.

And after dramatically unfollowing Cardi B on Twitter amid rumours of a rift, Iggy Azalea caused concern amongst fans this week - by deleting her entire Instagram feed.

The Fancy songstress, 29 - who boasts an impressive 13.3 million followers - removed every single post shared on the platform, and ensured she was following no one.

What happened? Iggy Azalea (pictured) deleted her entire Instagram feed - after unfollowing Cardi B on Twitter

It's the second drastic move she's made on social media this year, as back in May she deleted her accounts following a nude photo leak from a magazine shoot.

However, after stepping away to deal with the scandal, she returned to her channels a month later - and shared a string of photos on her Instagram feed following the short hiatus.

While it's unknown if the two are related, her latest deletion comes after Iggy unfollowed fellow female rapper Cardi B on Twitter.

Cardi had hinted it was her who made it possible for more than one female rapper to be successful during a chat on Tidal’s Rap Radar podcast.

Paving the way: Cardi B (pictured) said it's 'kinds easier for a lot of these female artists' since she came along

Deleted: Iggy removed every single one of her photos from her feed. Pictured: a now deleted photo of Iggy which previously stood proud on her page

'I feel like, after me, I’ll say that it’s kinda easier for a lot of these female artists,' she said.

'Like before me, there was no female rapper that was signed to a label - well, you know the ones that had already been established. Nobody was signing them.'

After receiving major backlash online - including from fans of female rap legend Nicki Minaj - Cardi wrote: 'I’m lying? So you tell me what rappers was giving features to female rappers?

'What label was pushing a female rapper? What TV music show was inviting female rappers. Only 2 female rappers for years and one ain’t last to long ......now you tell me! I wanna see something?'

All gone! Iggy, who boasts over 13 million followers, deleted her entire Instagram feed amid feud rumours

Sealed with a like! Iggy liked a fan's Tweet which appeared to mock Cardi B's earlier post, adding fuel to the fire that the pair are mid-feud

In a dramatic twist, Iggy then unfollowed Cardi and liked a tweet regarding her words, which read: 'B***h, you tried it!'

Eagle-eyed fans were quick to notice Iggy's social media move, with one writing: 'Welp, guess my good sis Iggy felt shaded. She unfollowed Cardi with the quickness.'

'Iggy Azalea has unfollowed Cardi B on Twitter...' a second wrote, while a third echoed: 'Iggy and Cardi unfollowed each other on Twitter.'

MailOnline has contacted a representative for Iggy for comment.
description: She's the Australian rapper who has been involved in a string of famous feuds over the years.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
